As a vaccinated person I must say my vaccine status doesn’t defy who I am or what I stand for. Terminating the working class from employment is basically taking out the back bone of America. It’s an complete violation of constitutional rights and establishing authoritarianism throughout the country. While it’s still imposing freedom of choice being- get vaccinated or find a new job. People like front line workers, police, nurses, ems and even soldiers choose not to get it. Studies from Yale university show that over 78% of front line workers don’t work for the pay but for the protection of their fellow Americans. The vaccine isn’t a “vaccine” it’s more of an suppressant that prevents having the full effects of COVID only at a 97% effective rating. Which still means those with full vaccination including the booster still can pass COVID around. Even after 3/4/5 shots you can still get COVID and transfer it an individual just as much as a person who hasn’t received a shot at all. People with religious exemptions still face termination even with proof. It’s very un divine and radical that when you go to the Supreme Court you place your hand on the Bible and tell “GOD” you will tel the truth. But that’s doesn’t apply to these factors apparently. America is digging its own whole it’s disgusting, dividing your own country Turning your people against each other, steering false information through News causing propaganda .
Well, for me it's cuz I made myself immune quite easily.
